column2: ENGLISH

[Root.PrimaryTitle.GetFOA],
I send you this request in the hope that you will grant the [sanction_requester.PrimaryTitle.GetFullName] holy sanction to attack [sanction_target.GetTitledName] in the name of the [Root.Religion.GetName]. With your leave, we will march forward in the name of [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName] and smite our enemies!

Your devoted subject,
[sanction_requester.GetTitledName]
In the name of [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName], let it be
[sanction_requester.GetSheHeCap] will need to do better than that
[sanction_requester.GetSheHeCap] does not deserve to act in [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]'s name

[Root.PrimaryTitle.GetFOA],
We are much in need of [Root.Religion.GetName] champions like yourself. Go in the name of [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName] and smite the heathen, [sanction_target.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal]. Let victory be yours.

With respect,
[From.GetTitledName]

[Root.PrimaryTitle.GetFOA],
While I am assured you are a pious [Root.Religion.GetName] [Root.GetManWoman], I feel the need to be convinced that what you intend is in the name of [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName] and not merely a means to acquire more land. Without such assurances, I cannot do as you ask.

With respect,
[From.GetTitledName]
Offer [From.GetHerHim] a hefty 'donation'
Acknowledge the [From.PrimaryTitle.GetRulerTitle]'s superior authority in [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName]
Send a talented relative to serve under the [From.PrimaryTitle.GetRulerTitle]
Promise [From.GetHerHim] a temple amongst [sanction_target.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal]'s lands
[From.GetSheHeCap] will get nothing from me

[Root.PrimaryTitle.GetFOA],
I will not have a [GetFromRootInsult] such as yourself acting in the name of [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName], when you are almost certainly seeking nothing more than personal gain. Attack the heathens if you will, but presume not to do so in the name of the [Root.Religion.GetName] faith.

Sincerely,
[From.GetTitledName]

[Root.PrimaryTitle.GetFOA],
I am your humble servant. Please find enclosed a donation to be used as the [Root.Religion.GetName] faith requires.

Sincerely,
[From.GetTitledName]

[Root.PrimaryTitle.GetFOA],
I am your humble servant. I will gladly acknowledge the [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetFullName]'s superior authority in the [From.PrimaryTitle.GetFullName], and trust this will serve as proof of our devotion.

Sincerely,
[From.GetTitledName]

[Root.PrimaryTitle.GetFOA],
I am your humble servant. I send with this letter a relative who has volunteered to personally serve the [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetFullName] as proof of our devotion.

Sincerely,
[From.GetTitledName]

[Root.PrimaryTitle.GetFOA],
I am your humble servant. I hereby pledge that, if [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName] grants us victory against the heathens, we will offer one of their temples to a [Root.Religion.GetName] holy order as proof of our devotion.

Sincerely,
[From.GetTitledName]

[Root.PrimaryTitle.GetFOA],
For the [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetRulerTitle] to ask so much of a loyal subject is beyond the pale. I will not do it.

With respect,
[From.GetTitledName]
With the victory against the heathens, you are reminded of your promise to surrender a newly-conquered temple for the use of the [Root.Religion.GetName] faith.
I gave my vow to [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]
They should conquer their own temples!
Grant §Y[This.GetBestName]§! holy leave to attack
Demand [This.GetSheHe] provide you additional incentive
Refuse holy sanction
